Class DecoratedFileUpload

Direct Known Subclasses:
IFileInput.ButtonFileInput
public class DecoratedFileUpload
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
implements com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasText, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasName, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.HasChangeHandlers

A decorated file upload is a widget which hides a FileUpload showing a clickable and customizable Widget, normally a button.

Author:
Manuel Carrasco Mo√±ino
